overview: School for dogs (in English Doggy Day School, and in Portuguese Escola pra Cachorro) is an animated series for children produced by producers Mixer (Brazil) and Cité-Amérique (Canada). The animation studio Lightstar Studios, located in Santos, Brazil, produced the animation for the first and second seasons, as well as directing the Brazilian director Marcelo Fernandes De Moura. The episodes show five puppies spending the day in a "nursery" for the animals, where they play, learn and make lots of friends. The program was broadcast in Brazil on Nickelodeon and also on TV Cultura.
title: Escuela para perros
